Text:
Moved to Audio > Other

If you create your music torrents with just MP3 and JPG files in them, no TXT or URL files, then you will be able to post them in the Audio > Music category, where music torrents normally go.


We have now banned your URL, since you are constantly spamming it.

Sorry man, I'm relatively new to making torrents. I added url files because many of the files I download include similar urls. I was unaware this practice was frowned upon. I will not be including url files in future uploads. Thanks for the suggestion.
